title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama-3, Mistral, Phi-3, Gemma...) with one command and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (ChatGPT-style) for Ollama: folders, shareable chats, multi-user, dark mode, mobile-ready.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama (chat, manage models, search) written in Python; keyboard-driven.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions; no internet required.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: ingest PDFs → Chroma vector DB → answer questions with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android compatible); Kotlin extensions, reactive streams.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama: supports .NET 6+, ASP.NET Core integration, streaming chat completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI/CD pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-observability
summary: OpenTelemetry exporter for Ollama metrics & traces; Grafana dashboards included.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that chats via any Ollama model; group & private chats, per-user quotas.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows; supports chat & embed.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing local LLMs to Discord servers; slash commands, context windows, role gating.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; tokio-based async client, strongly typed requests/responses.

title: ollama-model-tools
summary: Convert & quantize Hugging-Face models to GGUF then push to Ollama registry in one CLI.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library for Ollama with GenServer behaviour, LiveView hooks for real-time chat.
